Description:
Model
Brand: DIYPC
Model: DIY-F08-BK


Details
Type: ATX Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: Steel / Tempered Glass
With Power Supply: No
Power Supply Mounted: Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility: ATX / Micro ATX / Mini ITX
Side Panel Window: Yes
LED: ARGB


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 2
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 5
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 2 x USB2.0/ 1 x USB 3.0 / Audio In & Out (HD)


Cooling System
Fan Options: Top: 2 x 120mm or 140mm fan (Optional) 

PSU top: 2 x 120mm fan (Optional)

Rear: 1 x 120mm ARGB Fan (pre-installed)
Radiator Options: Rear - Up to 120mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 320 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 155 mm
Max PSU Length: 200 mm
Dimensions (H x W x D): 15.6" x 8" x 18"


Additional Info
Features: DIYPC DIY-F08-BK is a standard ATX gaming case. It has side tempered glass panel, w/top and front mesh
design allow optimized air flow. The case’s design has bigger interior space to accommodate and
improve cooling performance (can support up to 320mm x GPU and 360mm radiator x front). 
It supports up to 200mm long full ATX power supply to run the most power hungry system. 

Advanced cable management design – routing the main cable is easy and quick through a hidden channel.

2 ways to control ARGB Fan Lighting: Either by Manual ARGB LED Button on Top I/O Panel; or if your 
motherboard has 5v addressable connector, this case has ARGB 5V/3 pin header ready to SYNC w/your 
motherboard to control ARGB lighting. ARGB HUB controller is included.

Water cooling ready – front support up to 360mm , rear support 1 x 120mm radiator

Advanced bottom-mounted power supply design

Top mounted IO ports - 1 x USB 3/0 for up-to-date high speed data transfer

8 fans capability (3 x 120mm ARGB fan x front, 1 x 120mm ARGB fan ) 
                              provide great cooling and gaming performance

Magnetic dust filter at top - easy clean

Support up to 155mm CPU cooler

Support up to 320mm VGA card
Label: Chasis DIYPC DIY-F08-BK Black -3*
